title-part.text: MEASUREMENT OF INTENSITY, VELOCITY, SPECTRAL CONTENT, POLARISATION, PHASE OR PULSE CHARACTERISTICS OF INFRA-RED, VISIBLE OR ULTRA-VIOLET LIGHT

reference.text: light sources F21, H01J, H01K, H05B; investigating properties of materials by optical means G01N

note.note-paragraph: This subclass covers the detection of the presence or absence of infra-red, visible, or ultra-violet light, not otherwise provided for.
Attention is drawn to the Notes following the title of class G01.

reference.text: spectrophotometry G01J3/00; specially adapted for radiation pyrometry G01J5/00
